author: nk1506
title: Meh Set
review:
Ok, I did get This quite awhile ago so it is broken but I can still revew it

 

First Impresions

I didnt get how it worked at first and it didnt look like hockey at all so,yeah I didnt give it points for that.

 

Opening The Box

I dont remember whether it was in a polybag or a box but really that doesnt matter.

 

Peices

There were some nice peices so, yeah I liked that.

 

Build

Not epic, but seeing peices fit into other peices, it was a meh build.

 

over all

its a meh set as I said before so, Yeah buy it if youre an avid fan, other wise theres not much that will apeal to you.
